concept.definition: Activity is planned but no action has yet been taken.
Appointment or other booking has occurred but activity has not yet begun.
Activity has been started but is not yet complete.
Activity was started but has temporarily ceased with an expectation of resumption at a future time.
The activity has been completed (more or less) as planned.
The planned activity has been ended prior to completion after the activity was started.
The planned activity has been withdrawn.
The current state of the activity is not known.  Note: This concept is not to be used for "other".
The activity was entered in error and voided.

description: Indicates where the activity is at in its overall life cycle.
name: CarePlanActivityStatus

text.div:
CarePlanActivityStatus

Indicates where the activity is at in its overall life cycle.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/care-plan-activity-status defines the following codes:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinition
1not-started Not StartedActivity is planned but no action has yet been taken.
1scheduled ScheduledAppointment or other booking has occurred but activity has not yet begun.
1in-progress In ProgressActivity has been started but is not yet complete.
1on-hold On HoldActivity was started but has temporarily ceased with an expectation of resumption at a future time.
1completed CompletedThe activity has been completed (more or less) as planned.
1cancelled CancelledThe planned activity has been withdrawn.
2  stopped StoppedThe planned activity has been ended prior to completion after the activity was started.
1unknown UnknownThe current state of the activity is not known. Note: This concept is not to be used for "other".
1entered-in-error Entered In ErrorThe activity was entered in error and voided.

title: CarePlanActivityStatus
